programme.title: Vermont, snowboarders, and Nancy Cruzan
programme.short_synopsis: A discussion of the campaign for the right to die by the family of Nancy Cruzan.
programme.medium_synopsis: From his holiday retreat in Vermont, Alistair Cooke muses on the benefits of getting away from it all, ponders the plight of the snowboarder and discusses the right to die.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
